SELECT pmc.product_category_code, pmc.group_flag, pmc.product_group, pmc.product_main_category_image,
wpm.product_category_name FROM product_main_category pmc LEFT OUTER JOIN winia_product_mst wpm ON(wpm.product_category_code = pmc.product_category_code) WHERE pmc.company_code = #{company_code};

SELECT pmt.model_code, pmt.model_name, pmt.model_number_info, pmt.model_number_info_detail,
pmi.model_image_name FROM product_model_table pmt LEFT OUTER JOIN product_model_image pmi ON(pmi.model_code = pmt.model_code);

SELECT tst.trouble_code, tst.trouble_name FROM trouble_symptom_table tst LEFT OUTER JOIN trouble_product_category tpc ON(tpc.trouble_code = tst.trouble_code) WHERE tpc.product_category_code = #{category_code};
SELECT model_code, model_number FROM product_model_detail WHERE product_code = #{product_code} AND model_number LIKE concat("%", #{model_number}, "%");
